references.paper_title: Masactrl: Tuning-free mutual self-attention control for consistent image synthesis and editing
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel mechanism for consistent image synthesis and editing, which is relevant to the proposed ReF-LDM's approach of integrating multiple reference images.

references.paper_title: Taming transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the effectiveness of transformers for high-resolution image synthesis, which is the foundation of the latent diffusion model (LDM) used in ReF-LDM.

references.paper_title: VQFR: Blind face restoration with vector-quantized dictionary and parallel decoder
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for blind face restoration using vector quantization, which is relevant to the face restoration task addressed by ReF-LDM.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which is a crucial component of the latent diffusion model (LDM) architecture used in ReF-LDM.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces high-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models, which is directly relevant to the ReF-LDM's goal of generating high-quality images.
